mutants.code:
def find_min_sum(A, B, N):
    A = sorted(A)
    B = sorted(B)
    ans = 1
    for i in range(N):
        ans += abs(A[i] - B[i])
    return ans

def find_min_sum(A, B, N):
    A = sorted(A)
    B = sorted(B)
    ans = -1
    for i in range(N):
        ans += abs(A[i] - B[i])
    return ans

def find_min_sum(A, B, N):
    A = sorted(A)
    B = sorted(B)
    ans = 1
    for i in range(N):
        ans += abs(A[i] - B[i])
    return ans

def find_min_sum(A, B, N):
    A = sorted(A)
    B = sorted(B)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(N):
        ans -= abs(A[i] - B[i])
    return ans

def find_min_sum(A, B, N):
    A = sorted(A)
    B = sorted(B)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(N):
        ans += abs(A[i] + B[i])
    return ans

def find_min_sum(A, B, N):
    A = sorted(A)
    B = sorted(B)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(N):
        ans += abs(A[i] * B[i])
    return ans
